item.title: How to create a custom user provider in Laravel 9
item.description: Laravel provides several built-in user providers for authentication, including Eloquent and Database providers. However, sometimes you may want to use a custom data source or storage for user authentication. In such cases, you can create a custom user provider in Laravel.
